# a [[ululation]] uttered by certain [[North African]] and [[Middle Eastern]] [[woman|women]] as a sign of [[respect]]
types.html:
zagharit m (plural zagharits)

  1. a ululation uttered by certain North African and Middle Eastern women as a sign of respect
trans: a ululation uttered by certain North African and Middle Eastern women as a sign of respect
